features: 3 IN 1 DESIGN: This smudge bowl is large enough（5.3 inches) to accommodate various types of incense, including palo santo sticks, sage sticks, cedar smudge sticks, and incense cones. It offers flexibility and convenience for different aromatic practices.
HIGH-QUALITY & HANDCRAFT: Made from durable ceramic material, this palo santo burner is meticulously handcrafted, ensuring excellent quality, fine details and longevity.

100% ASH CATCH & EASY TO CLEAN: The ash-catching feature ensures a mess-free experience. The product comes with a brush and tweezers for easy removal of ash and residue. Simply wipe down the interior surface, and it will be as good as new.

MEANINGFUL DESIGN: The small chimney design not only adds a touch of elegance but also symbolizes the release of negative energy and the channeling of positive energy. The cut-out star pattern symbolizes hope and guidance, providing a guiding lighthouse for practitioners to find direction in their inner journey. This palo santo holder is very suitable meditation and yoga rooms.

WIDELY USED: Apart from being a functional incense burner holder, this holder serves as an elegant decorative piece suitable for yoga studios, meditation spaces, and home decor. It is packaged in a gift box, making it suitable as a gift for individuals who practice meditation, yoga, energy healing, or those who appreciate a fragrant, cozy, and peaceful atmosphere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Its versatility, quality craftsmanship, practicality, and meaningful design
reviews.reviewText: I am absolutely delighted to share my wonderful experience with the ZenBless 3 in 1 Incense Holder. This beautifully crafted holder has truly enhanced my aromatic practices and brought a sense of tranquility to my space. First and foremost, let me emphasize the impeccable design of this holder. Its 3 in 1 design makes it incredibly versatile, allowing me to use it with various types of incense, including palo santo sticks, sage bundles, cedar smudge sticks, and even incense cones. This flexibility adds a level of convenience to my rituals, ensuring that I can easily switch between different aromatic practices depending on my mood and preferences. The quality of craftsmanship is truly exceptional. Made from durable ceramic material and meticulously handcrafted, this holder exudes elegance and sophistication. The fine details and sturdy construction ensure its longevity, making it a valuable addition to my home decor. One of the standout features of this holder is its practicality. The ash-catching design ensures a mess-free experience, allowing me to enjoy my aromatic rituals without worrying about cleanup. The included brush and tweezers make it easy to remove ash and residue, keeping the holder clean and pristine. Moreover, the meaningful design elements add a deeper dimension to my practice. The small chimney not only adds a touch of elegance but also symbolizes the release of negative energy and the channeling of positive energy. The cut-out moon phase pattern serves as a beautiful reminder of the cyclical nature of life, enhancing my meditation and yoga practices with its symbolic significance.In conclusion, I cannot recommend the ZenBless 3 in 1 Incense Holder highly enough. Its versatility, quality craftsmanship, practicality, and meaningful design make it a truly exceptional product. Whether you're looking to enhance your aromatic rituals or add a touch of elegance to your space, this holder is an absolute must-have. Plus, with its affordable price point, it offers incredible value for the quality you receive. ZenBless has truly created a masterpiece with this incense holder, and I am grateful to have it enriching my home and practice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I'm in love!
reviews.reviewText: What a beautiful smudge bowl/chimney! It looks nice whether or not it's in use which I love. Very simple and understated, but not boring. The ceramic is thick and the glaze is well done, so it feels sturdy. I love the moon phase cut outs, reminding me that everything ebbs and flows. Once my smudge stick is smoldering I can pop it in and not worry about a mess or something else falling into the embers. This is a great addition to an alter or a yoga studio. I have it just at my house. It's also a great gift idea.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 3 in 1 Sage, Santo Palo, and Incense Burner
reviews.reviewText: I am in love with the ZenBless 3 in 1 incense burner. It is hand-crafted out of a nice smooth ceramic material. I really love the multi-functional design and I am going to be using it with Sage and Santo Palo for my Smudging practices. I also love the moon phases cut-outs. It reminds me of out with the old energy and in with new energy and the cycling of life. I also just love the simplicity of a tea light candle flickering through the moon cycle cut outs. ZenBless also thoughtfully included a tweezers and cleaning brush to make cleaning up the ashes much easier. I think that this 3 in 1 holder/chimney would make a wonderful addition to anyone’s Sage/Santo Palo or incense burning experience and collection, and it would also make a very special gift idea. I highly recommend checking out the ZenBless 3 in 1 incense holder!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I was looking for.
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a burner holder like this one for a while. The ceramic holder is beautiful with the cut outs of the moon and sun cast a beautiful glow. The smoke comes out from the top as well as the cut outs. So far I have used it to burn sage and rosemary. I like the fact that the warm doesn't get hot. It comes with tweezers and a fan brush to remove the ashes. No more ashes on the counter for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful design and MULTI-USE!
reviews.reviewText: It looks exactly like the photos and the presentation is so nice! It's secure and comes with everything you need to use and maintain it. The little broom is so adorable and the tweezers allow for easy placement without burning yourself. It's like a beautiful little house for all of your sacred cleansing herbs and incenses! I love it so much!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The package arrived on time. This incense holder was just what I needed to hold them. It gives me a piece of mind to know that they won’t be ashes all over on my counter anymore. They stay in one place and it looks so much better I love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Lovely and Attractive Holder for Palo Santo, Sage Bundles
reviews.reviewText: I enjoy burning palo santo, sage bundles, and incense cones; but I didn't always like the trays/dishes/surfaces that I'd been using for them. This ZenBless 3 in 1 Incense Holder intrigued me at first glance, so I picked it up.I was pleasantly surprised at the mantra/saying on the top of the box - even before opening I felt that I'd made the right choice.Upon opening, I saw the well-packed/-cushioned incense holder, along with a long tweezer and a brush, used to easily clean the base of the dish out after each use. The holder itself is lovely and, upon setting up/burning my rose-sage bundle, I saw that the smoke feeds up and out through only the hole at the top, which I believe allows for a longer burn - I might be wrong, but my sage bundle seemed to stay lit longer than it would on an open dish.This is overall a great choice, either for yourself or as a gift - had I not needed something like this for so long, I would have gifted it to someone - I have a FEW friends who I know would also appreciate/enjoy it. :)
